name: Xuyun Zhang
content: Xuyun Zhang - Macquarie University View Scopus Profile Xuyun Zhang Associate Professor, Dr Associate Professor, School of Computing https://orcid.org/0000-0001-7353-4159 Emailxuyun.zhangmq.eduau h-index 8746 Citations 52 h-index Calculated based on number of publications stored in Pure and citations from Scopus 20092025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyDr Xuyun Zhang is currently working as a Associate Professor in School of Computing at Macquarie University in Australia. Research interestsHe is a mid-career researcher with an international track record of research in areas including scalable and secure machine learning, big data privacy and cyber security, big data mining and analytics, cloud/edge/service computing and IoT, etc.TeachingMachine Learning Application in Cybersecurity Data Science Machine Learning Applied Cryptography Test-Driven Software Development Software Engineering Education/Academic qualificationComputer and Information Science, PhD, University of Technology Sydney1 Aug 2011 → 20 Nov 2014Award Date: 20 Nov 2014Computer and Science and Technology, Master of Engineering, Nanjing University1 Sept 2008 → 20 Jun 2011Award Date: 20 Jun 2011Computer Science and Technology, Bachelor of Science, Nanjing University1 Sept 2004 → 20 Jun 2008Award Date: 20 Jun 2008 Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Xuyun Zhang is active.
